PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-12602015-11-04,  ,  PMO, 
ActAgreement on Internal Trade Implementation Act
Canada Travelling Exhibitions Indemnification Act
Financial Administration Act
Industrial Design Act
Mackenzie Gas Project Impacts Fund Act
Museums Act
Nuclear Liability and Compensation Act
PrecisOrder (a) designating the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY as the MINISTER for the purposes of the AGREEMENT ON INTERNAL TRADE IMPLEMENTATION ACT; (b) designating the MINISTER OF CANADIAN HERITAGE as the MINISTER for the purposes of the CANADAN TRAVELLING EXHIBITIONS INDEMNIFICATION ACT; (c) repealing paragraph (b) of Order in Council P.C. 1993-1450 of June 25, 1993; and repealing paragraph (b) of Order in Council P.C. 1993-1982 of December 2, 1993; (d) designating the MINISTER OF INDUSTRY as the MINISTER for the purposes of the INDUSTRIAL DESIGN ACT; (e) designating the MINISTER OF THE CANADIAN NORTHERN ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AGENCY as the MINISTER for the purposes of the MACKENZIE GAS PROJECT IMPACTS FUND ACT; (f) designating the MINISTER OF CANADIAN HERITAGE as the MINISTER responsible for the National Gallery of Canada, the Canadian Museum of History, the Canadian Museum of Nature, the National Museum of Science and Technology, the Canadian Museum for Human Rights and the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, for the purposes of the MUSEUMS ACT; and (g) designating the MINISTER OF NATURAL RESOURCES to be the Minister referred to in the NUCLEAR LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION ACT, effective November 4, 2015.
